title: Mayday.Air.Crash.Investigations.S05.E07.Fanning.the.Flames.DVD.7
description:
Fanning the Flames



Aired on 05/21/2008, Narrated by Jonathan Aris



On 28 November 1987, South African Airways Flight 295, a Boeing 747-200 Combi, (combined passenger/cargo aircraft) starts filling with smoke high above the Indian Ocean after a fire breaks out in the rear main deck cargo area. The plane crashes with no survivors. The exact cause of the fire is still unknown. Afterwards, airlines refused to fly the 747 Combi, eventually, Boeing ceased building them in the 747 line.
